text: The Hungary men's national field hockey team represents Hungary in international field hockey competitions. ==Tournament record== ===Summer Olympics=== * 1936 – 8th place ===EuroHockey Championship=== *1970 – 17th place ===EuroHockey Championship III=== *2005 – 7th place *2021 – Qualified ===EuroHockey Championship IV=== *2015 – 5th place *2017 – *2019 – ==See also== *Hungary women's national field hockey team ==References== Category:European men's national field hockey teams Field hockey National team Category:Men's sport in Hungary
title: Hungary men's national field hockey team
